nodes.text: The Gk7 Cryocooler was a cooling unit. It was used to cool BlasTech Industries's E-Web (15) heavy repeating blaster. With the GK7 Cryocooler equipped, the E-Web (15) could fire for up to one hour at a sufficient range to discourage most armies.

The Gk7 Cryocooler was first mentioned in The Last Command Sourcebook, a hardcover supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, released in March 1994, in the Star Wars Legends continuity. The Gk7 Cryocooler was first mentioned in the new Star Wars Canon in Blasters and Firearms, a reference book published exclusively in France by Altaya on February 23, 2021.
